case.title: ANR LTR Wanted 30s
case.text:
I'm seeking a full relationship with an intelligent, kind and interesting man which also features breast play and suckling. As a very busty woman, men tend to gravitate towards this behavior anyway, but I am of the opinion that it's bonding for both parties, and a very good way to help maintain a positive relationship.
Please write to me if you're in your 30s or 40s, single, tall (as I'm tall) and interested both anr and companionship.
